body:
I would like to install the netlib-lapack package, using IBM ESSL for BLAS instead of, say, OpenBLAS. 
This is a very typical case on OpenPOWER systems, as we will always give priority to ESSL over other BLAS libraries.

What is the best way to handle this kind of configuration when installing a package with spack ?

Thanks!
title: How to use IBM ESSL with Spack?
